violations.description: A person with a black badge is present in the scene.
violations.recommendation: Remove the person from the scene and verify their badge color.

compliant_rules.notes: The number of people in a single zone exceeds 1000.

report.summary: There is a high risk due to the presence of a person with a black badge and over 1000 people in a single zone. Please remove the person from the scene and verify their badge color.
